title: The Bartender’s Big Tip
itunes:title: The Bartender’s Big Tip
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married for 12 years and my husband and I are in our mid 30s and are regulars at a local bar by our house. We’ve met a lot of great people at this bar and look forward to seeing them weekly for karaoke night. I like the sense of community we have there and we can hang out with the other couples we’ve befriended...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married for 12 years and my husband and I are in our mid 30s and are regulars at a local bar by our house.
